text: Hey all, I wanted to drop a note in here as I’ve recently used and had kind of forgotten how easy and powerful the Hooked app is <https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/apps/productivity/connector/hooked-powered-by-unmatched-1966606> If you have customers _*without Operations Hub Pro or Enterprise, but with access to Workflows*_ who would really benefit/need webhooks, but don’t have the budget or requirements of all the extra great tools that come with *Operations Hub Pro+* then this app is amazing.
